description: Brute force bypass configuration for the Alternative Bypass Methods subsystem

bruteForceTargets.name: Simple Door
bruteForceTargets.description: Standard wooden or light metal door with basic construction.

consequences.description: Loud noise alerts nearby (60 ft radius)

flavorText.description: a wooden door with a simple lock
flavorText.criticalSuccess: With a precise strike, the door gives way cleanly. The hinges surrender without protest, and the opening is clear.
flavorText.success: The door crashes inward with a resounding bang. Splinters scatter across the floor.
flavorText.failure: the door holds firm. You'll need to try harder.
flavorText.fumble: Your strike goes wide! You stumble into the doorframe, taking damage from the impact.

bruteForceTargets.name: Reinforced Door
bruteForceTargets.description: Metal-reinforced door with heavy construction and security features.

consequences.description: Very loud noise alerts guards (120 ft radius)

flavorText.description: a reinforced door with metal bracing
flavorText.criticalSuccess: You find the weak point in the reinforcement. One powerful blow, and the door buckles inward with minimal noise.
flavorText.success: Metal screeches against metal as the door finally gives way. The noise echoes through the corridors.
flavorText.failure: the reinforced door refuses to yield. Perhaps a different approach?
flavorText.fumble: The door doesn't budge, but something in your shoulder does. Pain shoots through your arm.

bruteForceTargets.name: Vault Door
bruteForceTargets.description: Heavy vault door of Old World or Jotun construction with extreme durability.

consequences.description: Very loud noise alerts guards (120 ft radius)

flavorText.description: a heavy vault door of Old World construction
flavorText.criticalSuccess: The vault door groans under your assault, and ancient seals finally give way. The interior appears undisturbed.
flavorText.success: After tremendous effort, the vault door surrenders. Your muscles ache, but the way is open.
flavorText.failure: the vault door remains sealed. This will require significant effort.
flavorText.fumble: A hidden mechanism triggers as you strike wrongâ€”sparks fly and you jerk back, burned.

bruteForceTargets.name: Container
bruteForceTargets.description: Locked container, chest, or safe with variable construction strength.

strengthModifier.description: Container strength affects DC and HP. Strength 1 = flimsy, 5 = heavy

consequences.description: Loud noise alerts nearby (60 ft radius)

flavorText.criticalSuccess: The lock mechanism snaps cleanly, and the container opens without damaging the contents within.
flavorText.success: The container bursts open. Some contents may have shifted roughly.
flavorText.failure: the container's lock resists your force.
flavorText.fumble: Your tool slips, gashing your hand. Blood drips onto the unyielding container.

environmentModifiers.description: Obstacle is already damaged or weakened
Hinges have been reinforced beyond standard
Ancient Jotun construction provides exceptional durability
Metal components are corroded and weakened

fumbleEffects.description: Fumble causes 1d6 damage, +2 permanent DC penalty, tool breaks, and maximum noise

criticalSuccess.description: Net successes >= 5 reduces noise by one level and avoids content damage and exhaustion

assistanceBonus.description: Each assisting character adds +1d10, maximum +2d10 total

exhaustionPenalty.description: Exhaustion reduces dice pool by half the exhaustion level
